content: Welcome to the advanced LaTeX puzzle challenge! Your objective is to use your exceptional LaTeX skills to create a unique title page that not only meets the specific criteria mentioned but also includes a table of contents and a bibliography. In addition to using packages to achieve a colored background, custom fonts for the title and author names, and a logo in the center, your code must also incorporate a footnote and an abstract. This challenge is designed to test your expertise, so put your best foot forward and strive for excellence! Good luck.
